meanings.definition: The state of being without a name.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the character's namelessnesses added an air of mystery.
meanings.sent2: The namelessnesses of the new species puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The namelessnesses of the stray cat led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The namelessnesses of the ghostly figure haunted the old mansion.
meanings.sent5: The namelessnesses of the hidden treasure intrigued the adventurous explorers.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking a name.
meanings.sent1: The namelessnesses of the ancient artifact made it even more intriguing.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of namelessnesses when she couldn't remember her own name.
meanings.sent3: The namelessnesses of the mysterious potion made the wizard chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The namelessnesses of the shadowy figure in the alley gave me chills.
meanings.sent5: The namelessnesses of the faceless man in the dream left a lasting impression.
